Quadratic sieve:
	http://www.cs.virginia.edu/crab/QFS_Simple.pdf
	http://websites.math.leidenuniv.nl/algebra/sieving.pdf
Gaussian elimination in GF(2)
	https://www.cs.umd.edu/~gasarch/TOPICS/factoring/fastgauss.pdf

Got mipr from https://github.com/Legrandin/mpir-windows-builds

Build command: something like
cmake .. -DBOOST_ROOT=/c/Users/marco.oman/Documents/boost_1_70_0/ \
         -DGMP_ROOT=/C/Users/marco.oman/Documents/git/mpir/lib/Win32/Release

Some tests:
time ./main --n=13090163955597839265304386635828428567856324123 --base-size=3200 --qsc
107355708017137734566479 * 121932631225422966763637 = 13090163955597839265304386635828428567856324123
